env0/OpenTofu - Remote - Europe/Americas - Full-time - Open Source Software Engineer

We’re a funded startup, building a platform that helps you automate and manage your IaC operations across different IaC frameworks. env0 helps you rolling out developer self-service, enhancing security and reliability of your IaC runs, all while accelerating deployments and lowering costs

We are also one of the companies behind the OpenTofu0 initiative, and are now hiring engineers to the OpenTofu core team. We’re looking for self-sufficient mid-to-senior software engineers, ideally with experience maintaining open-source projects. Your work will be 100% OpenTofu-related.

You can apply here1, if that sounds interesting to you!
